TextView.android:text:
Blue flash: You tried to draw a card but you've already drawn this turn!
 Yellow flash: You didn't have the right number of cards selected to discard or hit (one at a time!)
 Pink flash: You tried to hit, discard, or phase before you drew a card!
 No flash but what you tried to do didn't happen: You didn't have the right cards to phase or hit!
 Red flash: Bad things have happened.
